value: Livre Curieux et Utile pour Les Sçavans, et Artists. Composé de trois Alphabets de Chiffres, Simples, doubles et triples.

label: Description
value: Book of 153 pages of ornamental monogrames and some medallions. In addition, 16 plates of "Supports and Chimiera" for ornaments on armor: the 17th plate is bound in as a frontispiece. The "table" follows with the Forward placed last.

label: Physical description
value: Engravings on cream laid paper, bound in boards with leather spine

value: Hamill and Barker, Chicago, IL; 1962: acquired by Museum
